item.description: SAMSUNG'S quick charging technology allows you to use your mobile phone while it is charging. The SAMSUNG vehicle power charger also features a durable coil cord and advanced circuitry (Compatible with phones and accessories supporting MicroUSB connectivity).
item.author: webmaster@samsung.com

item.title: Cell Phones : [ Travel Charger (Micro USB) ] Travel Charger (Micro USB)
item.description: SAMSUNG'S quick charging technology allows you to use your mobile phone even while it is charging. The SAMSUNG travel charger plugs into any standard wall outlet. The compact and durable design makes it convenient to charge your battery while home or on the go. (Compatible with phones supporting MicroUSB connectivity)
item.author: webmaster@samsung.com

item.title: Cell Phones : [ Galaxy S Travel Charger (Detachable with USB to Micro USB Cable) ] Galaxy S Travel Charger (Detachable with USB to Micro USB Cable)

item.author: webmaster@samsung.com

item.title: Cell Phones : [ Modus 3500 Mono & Stereo Bluetooth Headset ] Modus 3500 Mono & Stereo Bluetooth Headset
item.description: Modus™ 3500 Bluetooth® headset is a premium performer in both mono and stereo modes. This headset offers Dual Mic Active Noise Cancelling for voice calls in high noise environments. You can connect the included stereo ear buds and enjoy rich, wireless stereo audio.The Modus™ 3500 Bluetooth® headset offers Wireless stereo from your Bluetooth enabled phone, your PC, gaming stations and/or your MP3 players. Using Multipoint connection you can be connected with 2 phones and stream stereo audio from any Bluetooth source.Facilitate calls with the in-line mic on the stereo headset. Talk time of up to 6 hours and standby time of up to 180 hours.
item.author: webmaster@samsung.com

item.title: Cell Phones : [ HM1100 Bluetooth Headset Kit, Black ] HM1100 Bluetooth Headset Kit, Black
item.description: The HM1100 Bluetooth® headset delivers top-of the-line clarity and sound quality. The Active Pairing function makes paring the headset with another device quick and easy. Feature rich the headset has Multipoint Technology for simultaneous connection to two Bluetooth® headsets, noise reduction and automatic volume control. Talk time of up to 7 hours and standby time of up to 400 hours.
item.author: webmaster@samsung.com
